languages.text: {n}Люди нестройно гудят, поддакивая вашим словам. В этом гуле нет ни капли искренности — чернь просто не смеет оспаривать слова само{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Люди нестройно гудят, поддакивая вашим словам. В этом гуле нет ни капли искренности — чернь просто не смеет оспаривать слова само{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The people murmur their halting agreement with your words. There is not an ounce of sincerity in this rumbling — the rabble simply does not dare challenge the words of the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La gente murmura, con una aceptación vacilante ante tus palabras. No hay ni pizca de sinceridad en lo que farfullan: la chusma no se atreve a desafiar lo que tiene que decir {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people murmur their halting agreement with your words. There is not an ounce of sincerity in this rumbling — the rabble simply does not dare challenge the words of the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La gente murmura, con una aceptación vacilante ante tus palabras. No hay ni pizca de sinceridad en lo que farfullan: la chusma no se atreve a desafiar lo que tiene que decir {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán.{/n}

languages.text: {n}民衆はあなたの言葉に訥々と同意した。このざわめきには、誠意のかけらもない。民衆は、ただロード・キャプテン自身の言葉に挑む勇気がないのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people murmur their halting agreement with your words. There is not an ounce of sincerity in this rumbling — the rabble simply does not dare challenge the words of the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}民衆はあなたの言葉に訥々と同意した。このざわめきには、誠意のかけらもない。民衆は、ただロード・キャプテン自身の言葉に挑む勇気がないのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}人群嘟囔着，断断续续地赞同着你的发言。然而，这群乌合之众的声音里没有一丝诚意，他们仅仅是不敢挑战领主舰长的权威而已。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people murmur their halting agreement with your words. There is not an ounce of sincerity in this rumbling — the rabble simply does not dare challenge the words of the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}人群嘟囔着，断断续续地赞同着你的发言。然而，这群乌合之众的声音里没有一丝诚意，他们仅仅是不敢挑战领主舰长的权威而已。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Leute murmelnd ihre zögerliche Anerkennung deiner Worte. Es gibt keinen Funken Aufrichtigkeit in diesem Grollen ... die Leute wagen es einfach nicht, die Worte des Lord Captains selbst infrage zu stellen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people murmur their halting agreement with your words. There is not an ounce of sincerity in this rumbling — the rabble simply does not dare challenge the words of the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Leute murmelnd ihre zögerliche Anerkennung deiner Worte. Es gibt keinen Funken Aufrichtigkeit in diesem Grollen ... die Leute wagen es einfach nicht, die Worte des Lord Captains selbst infrage zu stellen.

languages.text: {n}La foule approuve timidement vos paroles, mais vous ne décelez pas la moindre trace de sincérité dans ce murmure persistant. La populace n'ose tout simplement pas contester la volonté {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people murmur their halting agreement with your words. There is not an ounce of sincerity in this rumbling — the rabble simply does not dare challenge the words of the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La foule approuve timidement vos paroles, mais vous ne décelez pas la moindre trace de sincérité dans ce murmure persistant. La populace n'ose tout simplement pas contester la volonté {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İnsanlar, tereddütle de olsa sözlerine katıldıklarını mırıldanıyor. Bu gümbürtünün içinde dürüstlüğün zerresi bile yok. Ayaktakımı, sadece Lord Kaptan'ın sözlerine meydan okumaya cesaret edemiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people murmur their halting agreement with your words. There is not an ounce of sincerity in this rumbling — the rabble simply does not dare challenge the words of the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.{/n}
